job.title: Technical Product Manager, Data Science & Analytics, Apple Media Products - Cupertino
job.description: ltbrgtltstronggtsummaryltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtat apple great ideas have a way of becoming phenomenal products services and customer experiences very quickly if you are a selfmotivated highenergy individual who is not afraid of challenges were looking for you apple is seeking a proven technical product manager tpm to join the apple media products data science teamltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtthe tpm plays a critical role in collaborating with engineering and data scientists to design maintain build or improve missioncritical datasets from a multitude of sources this role will involve working with internetscale data across numerous product and customer touch points to drive initiatives that will make our data science organization more streamlined and productiveltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtthe teams culture is centered on rapid iteration with open feedback and debate along the way plus tightknit collaboration with data scientists product feature engineering and data engineeringltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtkey qualificationsltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtproven experience in a technical product management role preferably for a digitalmedia or subscription businessltbrgtltbrgtproven experience in datarelated programming languages eg sql pyspark python or rltbrgtltbrgtknowledge of clientserver metrics logging strategies as well as data architecture required for analysisltbrgtltbrgthands on experience with the endtoend data lifecycle across petabyte scale technologiesltbrgtltbrgtprior experience in a technical role preferably as a data analyst or engineer delivering data insights to stakeholders ltbrgtltbrgtstrong experience designing and driving product strategy crossfunctionally collaborating with partners of various technical levelsltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtdescriptionltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtdata is our product we are looking for a selfstarting motivated individual with great communication skills that is passionate about managing and developing critical datasets to maximize data science capabilities if you have a passion for apple services tv music arcade podcasts etc it would be a big plusltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtyou should have a strong interest in driving large scale data products engaging with key business stakeholders involved and driving key communications throughout the businessltbrgtltbrgt
